attributes.additional_details: The Government has spurious reasons for selling another asset which belongs to everyone and enjoys wide popularity as well as high quality news and support for content makers.
attributes.background: Stop the Government’s proposed sell off of Channel 4 and keep it under public ownership with the same operating basis it enjoys today.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
